entries.meaning: A restatement of a text in different words, often to clarify meaning.
(Scotland) One of a certain number of Scripture passages turned into verse for use in the service of praise.

verbs.description: paraphrase (third-person singular simple present paraphrases, present participle paraphrasing, simple past and past participle paraphrased)

entries.meaning: (transitive, intransitive) To restate something as, or to compose a paraphrase.
